property.caption: Typed Query
property.description: Css class selector. Use select element you wish to be typed. ex: class

property.caption: Enabled/Disabled
property.description: Whether typing is enable or disabled

property.caption: Texts
property.description: Each text to be typed before cursor backspace. Use html break tag to insert a line break. Use the ^ symbol followed by a number in milliseconds to pause the typing for that amount of time. Ex: ^750 to pause for 750 milliseconds

property.caption: Text Static
property.description: Text to be typed. Use html break tag to insert a line break. Use the ^ symbol followed by a number in milliseconds to pause the typing for that amount of time. Ex: ^750 to pause for 750 milliseconds

property.caption: Type Speed
property.description: Type speed in milliseconds

property.caption: Start Delay
property.description: Delay time before typing starts in milliseconds

property.caption: Backspeed
property.description: Backspacing speed in milliseconds

property.caption: Back Delay
property.description: BackDelay time before backspacing in milliseconds

property.caption: Fade Out
property.description: Fade out instead of backspace

property.caption: Fade out delay
property.description: Fade out delay in milliseconds

property.caption: Loop Count
property.description: Amount of loops

property.caption: Cursor Character
property.description: Character for cursor

property.caption: Show Cursor
property.description: Show Cursor

property.caption: Button Initiate typed
property.description: When a button is clicked, create typed object. This field is the button class.

property.caption: Button Destroy
property.description: Button (class) to destroy this instance of Typed

property.caption: Button Toggle
property.description: Button (class) to toggle the Start and Stop of the typing

property.caption: Button Start
property.description: Button (class) to start typing / backspacing after being stopped

property.caption: Button Stop
property.description: Button (class) to stop typing / backspacing and enable cursor blinking

property.caption: Button Reset
property.description: Button (class) to reset Typed and optionally restarts

property.caption: OnComplete
property.description: Trigger a microflow when typing is complete

property.caption: OnDestroy
property.description: Trigger a microflow when when typed object is changed which detroys the previous typed object, or on explicit destroy

property.caption: Pre String Typed
property.description: Trigger a microflow before each string is typed

property.caption: On String Typed
property.description: Trigger a microflow after each string is typed

property.caption: On Typing Resumed
property.description: Trigger a microflow after typing has been started after being stopped

property.caption: On Reset
property.description: Trigger a microflow after reset

property.caption: On Stop
property.description: Trigger a microflow after stop

property.caption: On Start
property.description: Trigger a microflow after start
